overview:
Jacob an agile ‘location independent’ developer and designer whose expertise is in conceptualisation and developmentâ€”at the conjunction of cloud, web, and desktop platforms.

Currently focussed on SaaS using Lua, he has worked extensively with web-services, developing solutions particularly in the photo-sharing sector, with companies such as Pixelpipe, Microsoft and Scrapblog. Prior roles included Mac Operator, Designer, Web Developer and Technical Director, working on a wide array of projects at a marcomms firm in London.
